info.name: BetterYT (for YouTube Mobile site)
info.description:
Tweaks to make the YT mobile site a bit better. Features include:

- Dark mode (follows system settings)
- More padding on video browsing pages (if your screen is wide enough)
- Subtle hover effects on some buttons.
info.additionalInfo:
V1.1:
-Fix subscription page in dark mode

V1:
-Initial release
